text: Jukka Mikkola (3 July 1943 â€“ 23 March 2018) was a Finnish politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party. He was a lawyer and has the title Master of Laws. He continued as the second deputy speaker of the parliament for the remaining term 1999-2003. Mikkola died after a long illness on 23 March 2018, aged 74. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Finland Category:Finnish lawyers
title: Jukka Mikkola
